languages.text: Подскочив к наполовину разобранному реациклу, Жертва отпихивает ремонтирующего его невольника и с вызывающей уважение ловкостью парой манипуляций вызывает перегрузку его антигравитационного двигателя. Она едва успевает отскочить, когда оглушительный взрыв наполняет воздух картечью из камня, призрачной кости и кусков тел.

The Prey rushes over to a half-dismantled jetbike, shoves away the slave who is repairing it, and overloads its antigravity engine with admirable dexterity. It barely has the time to bounce back before a deafening explosion fills the air with shards of rock, pieces of wraithbone, and fragments of bodies.
languages.original_text: Подскочив к наполовину разобранному реациклу, Жертва отпихивает ремонтирующего его невольника и с вызывающей уважение ловкостью парой манипуляций вызывает перегрузку его антигравитационного двигателя. Она едва успевает отскочить, когда оглушительный взрыв наполняет воздух картечью из камня, призрачной кости и кусков тел.

traits.locale_text: The Prey rushes over to a half-dismantled reacycle, shoves away the slave who is repairing it and overloads its antigravity engine with admirable dexterity. It barely has the time to bounce back before a deafening explosion fills the air with shards of rock, Wraithbone and chunks of bodies.
traits.speaker: Player

It barely has the time to bounce back before a deafening explosion fills the air with shards of rock, Wraithbone and chunks of bodies.

traits.locale_text: The Prey rushes over to a half-dismantled reacycle, shoves away the slave who is repairing it, and overloads its antigravity engine with admirable dexterity. It barely has the time to bounce back before a deafening explosion fills the air with shards of rock, pieces of the Ghostbone, and fragments of bodies.
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: The Prey rushes over to a half-dismantled reacycle, shoves away the slave who is repairing it, and overloads its antigravity engine with admirable dexterity. It barely has the time to bounce back before a deafening explosion fills the air with shards of rock, pieces of the Ghostbone, and fragments of bodies.

traits.locale_text: The Prey rushes over to a half-dismantled jetbike, shoves away the slave who is repairing it, and overloads its antigravity engine with admirable dexterity. It barely has the time to bounce back before a deafening explosion fills the air with shards of rock, pieces of wraithbone, and fragments of bodies.
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: The Prey rushes over to a half-dismantled jetbike, shoves away the slave who is repairing it, and overloads its antigravity engine with admirable dexterity. It barely has the time to bounce back before a deafening explosion fills the air with shards of rock, pieces of wraithbone, and fragments of bodies.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 獲物は半分解体されたジェットバイクに駆け寄り、それを修理していた奴隷を突き飛ばし、見事な器用さで反重力エンジンをオーバーロードさせた。耳をつんざくような爆発が岩の破片、幽骨の破片、死体の破片で辺りを満たす前に、かろうじて態勢を整えた。
languages.original_text: The Prey rushes over to a half-dismantled jetbike, shoves away the slave who is repairing it, and overloads its antigravity engine with admirable dexterity. It barely has the time to bounce back before a deafening explosion fills the air with shards of rock, pieces of wraithbone, and fragments of bodies.

traits.locale_text: 獲物は半分解体されたジェットバイクに駆け寄り、それを修理していた奴隷を突き飛ばし、見事な器用さで反重力エンジンをオーバーロードさせた。耳をつんざくような爆発が岩の破片、幽骨の破片、死体の破片で辺りを満たす前に、かろうじて態勢を整えた。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 猎物冲到了一台拆卸了一半的喷气摩托前，一把推开正在修理机器的奴隶，以令人钦佩的技艺弄坏了反重力引擎。没过多久，那辆摩托就发出了震耳欲聋的爆炸声，岩石、灵骨与尸体碎片被炸得到处都是。
languages.original_text: The Prey rushes over to a half-dismantled jetbike, shoves away the slave who is repairing it, and overloads its antigravity engine with admirable dexterity. It barely has the time to bounce back before a deafening explosion fills the air with shards of rock, pieces of wraithbone, and fragments of bodies.

traits.locale_text: 猎物冲到了一台拆卸了一半的回收设备前，一把推开正在修理机器的奴隶，以令人钦佩的技艺弄坏了反重力引擎。没过多久，机器就发出了震耳欲聋的爆炸声，岩石、灵骨与尸体碎片被炸得到处都是。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: La presa se abalanza sobre una moto a reacción medio desmantelada, empuja al esclavo que la está reparando y sobrecarga su motor antigravedad con una destreza admirable. Apenas tiene tiempo de alejarse antes de que una explosión ensordecedora llene el aire de fragmentos de roca, trozos de hueso fantasmal y restos de cuerpos.
languages.original_text: The Prey rushes over to a half-dismantled jetbike, shoves away the slave who is repairing it, and overloads its antigravity engine with admirable dexterity. It barely has the time to bounce back before a deafening explosion fills the air with shards of rock, pieces of wraithbone, and fragments of bodies.

traits.locale_text: La presa se abalanza sobre una recicladora medio desmantelada, empuja al esclavo que la está reparando y sobrecarga su motor antigravedad con una destreza admirable. Apenas tiene tiempo de alejarse antes de que una explosión ensordecedora llene el aire de fragmentos de roca, trozos de hueso fantasmal y restos de cuerpos.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Die Beute eilt zu einem demontierten Jetbike, schubst den Sklaven zur Seite, der es gerade repariert, und überlädt mit bewundernswerter Geschicklichkeit den Anti-Gravitations-Motor. Sie hat kaum die Zeit, sich wieder aufzurappeln, bevor eine ohrenbetäubende Explosion die Luft mit Felssplittern, Phantomkristall-Fragmenten und Leichenfetzen füllt.
languages.original_text: The Prey rushes over to a half-dismantled jetbike, shoves away the slave who is repairing it, and overloads its antigravity engine with admirable dexterity. It barely has the time to bounce back before a deafening explosion fills the air with shards of rock, pieces of wraithbone, and fragments of bodies.

traits.locale_text: Die Beute eilt zu einem halb zerlegten Reacycle hinüber, schubst den Sklaven beiseite, der es gerade repariert, und überlädt mit bewundernswerter Geschicklichkeit den Anti-Gravitations-Motor. Sie hat kaum die Zeit, sich wieder aufzurappeln, bevor eine ohrenbetäubende Explosion die Luft mit Felssplittern, Geisterknochen-Fragmenten und Leichenfetzen füllt.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: La proie se rue sur un motojet à moitié démantelé, pousse hors de son chemin l'esclave occupé à le réparer et déclenche avec habileté une surcharge du moteur antigravité. Elle se recule juste à temps pour éviter l'explosion assourdissante qui emplit l'air de fragments de roche, de débris de moelle spectrale et de morceaux de corps.
languages.original_text: The Prey rushes over to a half-dismantled jetbike, shoves away the slave who is repairing it, and overloads its antigravity engine with admirable dexterity. It barely has the time to bounce back before a deafening explosion fills the air with shards of rock, pieces of wraithbone, and fragments of bodies.

traits.locale_text: La proie se rue sur un recycleur à moitié démantelé, pousse hors de son chemin l'esclave occupé à le réparer et déclenche avec habileté une surcharge du moteur antigravité. Elle se recule juste à temps pour éviter l'explosion assourdissante qui emplit l'air de fragments de roche, de débris du Ghostbone et de morceaux de corps.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Avım; yarı yarıyla sökülmüş bir jetmotosiklete doğru koşuyor, onu onaran köleyi bir kenara fırlatıyor ve takdire şayan bir atiklikle makinenin yer çekimi tanımaz motorunu aşırı yüklüyor. Kulakları sağır eden patlama; havayı kaya, tayfkemik ve beden parçalarıyla doldurmadan kaçıp gidiyor.
languages.original_text: The Prey rushes over to a half-dismantled jetbike, shoves away the slave who is repairing it, and overloads its antigravity engine with admirable dexterity. It barely has the time to bounce back before a deafening explosion fills the air with shards of rock, pieces of wraithbone, and fragments of bodies.

traits.locale_text: Av, yarı yarıyla sökülmüş bir jetmotosiklete doğru koşuyor, onu onaran köleyi bir kenara fırlatıyor ve takdire şayan bir atiklikle makinenin anti yer çekimi motorunu aşırı yüklüyor. Kulakları sağır eden patlama, havayı kaya, tayfkemik ve beden parçalarıyla doldurmadan önce, son anda kaçıyor.
traits.speaker: Player
